quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle steak bowl contains about 780 kcal and 42 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle steak bowl?
faqs.a: About 780 kcal for a standard build with rice, beans, steak, veggies, salsa, cheese, and sour cream.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a steak bowl from Chipotle?
faqs.a: Roughly 42 g protein, mainly from the steak and beans.

faqs.q: Is a Chipotle steak bowl high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1980 mg due to seasonings and cheese—watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie steak bowl at Chipotle?
faqs.a: Opt for no rice, extra veggies, skip cheese/sour cream; can drop to under 500 kcal.

faqs.q: Carbs in a steak bowl from Chipotle?
faqs.a: About 85 g carbs, with 12 g fiber from beans and veggies; mostly from rice.
